include ("${EXTERNALS_LIB_LOCATION}/CMake-Register_External_Lib.txt")

set (CRC32_ARCHIVE "${CRC32_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/libcrc32.a")

register_external_lib (crc32 ${CRC32_BUILTIN_LOCATION} ${CRC32_ARCHIVE})

set (CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -I${CRC32_BUILTIN_LOCATION} -D_BUILT_IN_CRC32")
set (CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -I${CRC32_BUILTIN_LOCATION} -D_BUILT_IN_CRC32")
